cattleFeed.name: Prestige Meet Growing
cattleFeed.description: High-quality cattle feed for promoting healthy growth in young cattle.
cattleFeed.ingredients: Corn, soybean meal, wheat, vitamins, minerals
cattleFeed.usage: Feed 2-3 times daily according to the weight and age of the cattle.

cattleFeed.name: Prestige Milk Booster
cattleFeed.description: Specially formulated feed to enhance milk production in dairy cattle.
cattleFeed.ingredients: Barley, oats, corn, molasses, vitamins, minerals
cattleFeed.usage: Feed 2 times daily along with regular feed for optimal milk production.

cattleFeed.name: Prestige Energy Booster
cattleFeed.description: High-energy feed for providing an extra boost of energy to cattle.
cattleFeed.ingredients: Soybean meal, corn, wheat bran, molasses, vitamins, minerals
cattleFeed.usage: Feed as a supplement during periods of high energy requirements or increased activity.

cattleFeed.name: Prestige Pregnancy
cattleFeed.description: Nutrient-rich feed to support healthy pregnancy in cattle.
cattleFeed.ingredients: Soybean meal, alfalfa, corn gluten meal, vitamins, minerals
cattleFeed.usage: Feed during the entire pregnancy period to ensure proper nutrition and fetal development.

cattleFeed.name: Prestige Supergold
cattleFeed.description: Premium quality feed with balanced nutrition for overall cattle health.
cattleFeed.ingredients: Barley, oats, corn, soybean meal, vitamins, minerals
cattleFeed.usage: Feed as a complete ration to meet all nutritional requirements of cattle.

cattleFeed.name: Prestige Transfer
cattleFeed.description: Special feed to aid in the transfer of cattle from one diet to another.
cattleFeed.ingredients: Wheat, rice bran, corn gluten meal, molasses, vitamins, minerals
cattleFeed.usage: Gradually introduce this feed while transitioning cattle to a new diet.
